verses.verse: Come, <S%H3212><s%> and let us return <S%H7725><s%> to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> for he has torn, <S%H2963><s%> and he will heal <S%H7495><s%> us; he has smitten, <S%H5221><s%> and he will bind <S%H2280><s%> us up.

For I desired <S%H2654><s%> mercy, <S%H2617><s%> and not sacrifice; <S%H2077><s%> and the knowledge <S%H1847><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> more than burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings.
